text: Kyee Myint Saw (; born 1939) is a painter from Myanmar. His paintings invoke the various hues of typical Myanmar colours under the tropical sun. == Early life == Myint Saw was born in 1939 in Yangon, Myanmar. He graduated with B.Sc (Maths) in 1966 and M.Sc (Maths) in 1990 at Yangon University . ==References== Category:Living people Category:1939 births Category:Burmese painters Category:Burmese performance artists
title: Kyee Myint Saw
